mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket_pay (ticket_pay_num, ticket_num, ticket_pay_name, ticket_pay_zipcode, ticket_pay_address1, ticket_pay_address2, ticket_pay_phone, mem_num) VALUES (ticket_pay_seq.nextval, #{ticket_num}, #{ticket_pay_name}, #{ticket_pay_zipcode}, #{ticket_pay_address1}, #{ticket_pay_address2}, #{ticket_pay_phone}, #{mem_num})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM ( SELECT b.ticket_num, b.ticket_category,
REPLACE(REPLACE(b.ticket_name, '<', '<'),'>','>') b.ticket_name,
FROM ticket_pay a JOIN ticket b ON a.ticket_num = b.ticket_num JOIN member m ON b.mem_num = m.mem_num
WHERE a.mem_num = #{mem_num} ) a )
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
